MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:34pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the local substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
